nodes.text: An apartment on the planet Coruscant served as the residence of Senator Christo.
Christo's apartment featured a large aquarium and a view of the Coruscant skyline.
During the Clone Wars, Senators Padmé Amidala and Onaconda Farr visited Senator Christo in his apartment to discuss the military spending bill.

Christo's apartment first appeared in "Pursuit of Peace," the eleventh episode of the canon animated series Star Wars: The Clone Wars' third season. It was identified as Christo's apartment in concept art included in the accompanying episode guide on StarWars.com.
